bibl.title: Alexandria and Memphis. Some Historical Observations.
bibl.note: Part I (by E.A.E.R.); - Part II (by J.B.). The two papers were read on the 30th of July 1974 before the XIVth International Congress of Papyrologists held in Oxford. - Pp. 23-24: Order of succession of the High Priests of Memphis in Ptolemaic Times.
Reymond E.A.E. and John Barns, Alexandria and Memphis. Some Historical Observations.
